data.name: Last Light - Wallpaper Pack
data.detailed_description:
This DLC contains a set of wallpapers of Last Light.
They are different from what is included in the Digital Artbook.

A cute and peaceful version of Last Light can be seen in these wallpapers.
Try out the adorable designs on your PC and smartphone!


- 3 wallpapers for PC
1920x1080 (.png)
- 3 wallpapers for smartphone
1080x2337 (.png)

Note:
- This DLC does not include the main game.
- The downloaded file will be included in the following folder.
...Steam/steamapps/common/Last Light/Last Light Wallpaper Pack

English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
